Title: Endless Night
Actors: Juliette Binoche, Rinko Kikuchi, Gabriel Byrne, Orto Ignatiussen
Plot: Josephine (Binoche) travels to the hostile icy landscape of the remote North in search of her explorer husband. As winter descends and determined not to turn back she finds companionship with an Inuit woman (Kikuchi). With the elements against them and their survival reliant on each other it becomes clear they are waiting for a man they both love.
